name: Evil House (itch)
description:
Embark on a horrific journey of discovery;

evil house is a short indie horror game,, first-person, puzzle , narrative-driven horror adventure from aldaghlas Studios

Key features:

  • A short creepy horror experience
  • Bite-sized thrill
  • average playtime of 30 - 45 mins 
  • Immersive sound design
  • horror puzzle

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Left Mouse: Use
  • Right Mouse: Use Key /  Carry Object
  • F: Lighter
  • TAB: Inventory

 

 

Feel free to rate the game and leave a comment :)
